name: Catapult.ac
description: Catapult is an easy-to-use multichain fundraising and ambassador platform for Web3 projects of all stages, integrated with a multichain wallet and cross-marketing solution for blockchain ecosystems Our mission is to contribute to Web3 by creating products that establish transparent and mutually beneficial collaboration between blockchain ecosystems, project teams, influencers, VCs, and retail investors. We strive to become a self-sustaining company built on DAO principles
